title: New: The Distnce – Dry Land
body:
Every now and then a track comes along that embeds itself so deeply in your consciousness that the only way to shake it is through repeated listens.

_Dry Land_ from Los Angeles duo [**The Distnce**](http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-Distnce/146095785474527?sk=wall) certainly fits this criteria; with it’s irresistible dream pop vocals and luscious electronic percussion sections. The lyrics are simple yet effective, however the beauty lies within the chorus, one of the finest I’ve heard this year; _‘Way out to sea, they’re looking for me, till I find my way to dry land’._ With a few thousand views on Youtube already, and the track now available via [bandcamp](http://thedistnce.bandcamp.com/track/dry-land) on a pay what you like basis, I get the feeling that it won’t be long before **The Distnce** are generating the buzz that _Dry Land_ deserves.
